name: Super League
overview: Football management games come and go, however Super League has to be the ultimate soccer management simulator. Features include: Organized Crime: Will you "throw the game" or suffer the painful consequences. Will your club survive the introduction of the loathed membership card scheme? Cay you afford to modernize your grounds, keeping pace with the demands of fans? All these unexpected elements and many of the more traditional features combine to produce one of the most accurate and challenging games on the market.
